languages.text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.
languages.original_text: Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Если на этого союзника действует Приказ командира и ему удается убить противника до конца хода офицера, то этот союзник получает однократную прибавку к {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментуму{/g} +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}. Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} нельзя использовать на одном и том же союзнике более одного раза за раунд.

traits.locale_text: The Leader immediately grants an ally an extra turn with action points equal to (Leader's FEL bonus)/2 and no movement points.{br} If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy until the end of the Leader's turn, the ally gains an additional +2×(ally's resolve) momentum once.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If this ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. This ability cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If this ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If this ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

languages.text:
Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если на этого союзника действует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} и ему удается убить противника до конца хода офицера, то этот союзник получает однократную прибавку к {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментуму{/g} +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} нельзя использовать на одном и том же союзнике более одного раза за раунд.

The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text:
Офицер немедленно предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если на этого союзника действует {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказ командира{/g} и ему удается убить противника до конца хода офицера, то этот союзник получает однократную прибавку к {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментуму{/g} +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} нельзя использовать на одном и том же союзнике более одного раза за раунд.

Лидер немедленно предоставляет союзнику дополнительный ход вместе с (бонус ОБЩ лидера / 2) ОД и 0 ОП.{br} Если на этого союзника действует эффект Приказа командира и ему удается убить противника до конца хода лидера, то этот союзник получает однократную прибавку к моментуму +(2 × решимость союзника).

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} немедленно предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.{br} Если на этого союзника действует Приказ командира и ему удается убить противника до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} офицера, то этот союзник получает однократную прибавку к {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментуму{/g} +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}.

languages.text:
军官使目标盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，该盟友获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与0点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果该盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}的影响，而且在军官的回合结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}一次性提高{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}点。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}每轮只能对每位盟友使用一次。
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text: 领袖使目标盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，给予的额外{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}等同于（领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2），但该盟友没有任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的影响，而且在领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友会一次性获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，士气加值等同于（2×该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}）。

军官使目标盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，给予的额外{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}等同于2，但该盟友不会获得任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的影响，而且在军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友会一次性获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，士气加值等同于{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}使目标盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，该盟友获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与0点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的影响，而且在军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}一次性提高{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}点。 此能力每轮只能对每位盟友使用一次。

languages.text:
El oficial otorga inmediatamente a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y sin {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si el aliado se halla bajo los efectos de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} y mata a un enemigo antes de que termine el turno del oficial, el aliado gana un único incremento de +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no se puede usar con un mismo aliado más de una vez por asalto.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text: El oficial otorga inmediatamente a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con tantos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} como ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del oficial / 2) y sin {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}.{br} Si el aliado se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando y mata a un enemigo antes de que termine el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, el aliado gana un único incremento de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} igual a +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del aliado).

El oficial otorga inmediatamente a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con tantos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} como 2 y sin {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}.{br} Si el aliado se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando y mata a un enemigo antes de que termine el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, el aliado gana un único incremento de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} igual a +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}.

languages.text:
Der Offizier verleiht einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und keinen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Wenn der Verbündete mit {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} belegt ist und vor Ende des Zugs des Offiziers einen Feind tötet, erhält der Verbündete einmalig +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann in einer Runde nicht mehrmals auf denselben Verbündeten angewendet werden.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkten{/g} in Höhe von ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers / 2) und keinen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkten{/g}.{br} Wenn der Verbündete unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht und einen Feind vor dem Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Offiziers tötet, erhält der Verbündete einmalig zusätzlich +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Verbündeten) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkten{/g} in Höhe von ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers / 2) und keinen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkten{/g}.{br} Wenn der Verbündete unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht und einen Feind vor dem Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Offiziers tötet, erhält der Verbündete einmalig zusätzlich +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text:
L'officier confère immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié avec 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et sans aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
Si l'allié est sous l'effet de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et qu'il élimine un ennemi avant la fin du tour de l'officier, il obtient un bonus ponctuel supplémentaire de +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut pas être utilisée sur le même allié plus d'une fois par round.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text: Le Leader confère immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié avec un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} égal à ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader / 2) et sans aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}point de déplacement{/g}.{br} Si l'allié est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement et qu'il élimine un ennemi avant la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader, il obtient +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de l'allié) de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} ponctuelle supplémentaire.

Le Leader confère immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un allié avec un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} égal à ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader / 2) et sans aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}point de déplacement{/g}.{br} Si l'allié est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement et qu'il élimine un ennemi avant la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader, il obtient +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} ponctuelle supplémentaire.

languages.text: 士官は即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2付与し、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は付与しない。 味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、士官のターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方は一度切りの追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を+{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}得る。 同じ味方に対して本{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるのは、1ラウンドにつき1度のみ。
languages.original_text: The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If this ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text: 士官は即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を2付与し、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は付与しない。 味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、士官のターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方は一度切りの追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を+{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}得る。 同じ味方に対して本{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるのは、1ラウンドにつき1度のみ。

オフィサーは即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。この追加ターンは2に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}はない。{br} 味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、オフィサーの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方は一度切りの追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を+{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}得る。

士官は即座に味方に{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。この追加ターンは(士官の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ボーナス{/g} / 2)に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}アクションポイント{/g}を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}移動ポイント{/g}はない。{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary} 味方が指揮の声の効果下にあり、士官の{/g}ターン終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方は一度切りの追加の推進力を+(2 × 味方の決断力)得る。

languages.text:
Subay, bir dost birime 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'si{/g} olan ancak hiç {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'si bulunmayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır.
Dost birim, {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}'nün etkisi altındaysa ve Subay'ın turu sona ermeden bir düşmanı öldürürse +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} kadar tek seferlik ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir raunt içinde aynı dost birim üzerinde birden çok kez kullanılamaz.
languages.original_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

languages.text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.

traits.locale_text:
The Officer immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If this ally is under the effect of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's turn, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used on the same ally more than once per round.
